summary: This mod adds a large mountain pass (new worldspace) called Jouneyman's Isle located north of Dawnstar. For strong characters. It's a hell of a ways to the top!
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to [b]Journeyman's Isle[/b]. A harsh, foreboding glacier that also happens to be home to a bunch of rather unpleasant dead things...

Battle your way up to the peak (1-2hrs depending on strength)
Fight numerous bosses
Fight hordes of medium strength undead in an all-out slug-fest!
Delve into the philosophical, metaphorical, world of the key characters

To begin: Go to Dawnstar windpeak inn and talk to [b]Jani Hammarskjold, [/b]then when you have the quest, head up to the jetty beyond the entrance to DB sanctuary...

Known glitches & Issues:

Some mobs will run off the cliff of the mountain, navmesh issues, I will try to fix.
Some dialogue typos.
Some enemies may not attack, navmesh issues again which I will try to resolve.
Unfortunately Journeyman's Isle is [b]NOT FOLLOWER/CONJURER FRIENDLY. [/b]Again its to do with the sh1tty navmeshes and I am sorry for that :(

Please report any bugs you find and I will upload a fixed version in a while.

Possible future update: Could add voice acting and a small music score.

enjoy

-Imp
author: ImpGimp
